original_title: Le Quatuor à cornes : Là-haut sur la montagne
overview: After their journey that led them to the sea, our four cows, Clarisse, Marguerite, Aglaé and Rosine, are now on their way to the mountains. JB, the eco-pastoral guide, invited them to join him on a trip to discover the snow-capped peaks.
title: Le Quatuor à cornes : Là-haut sur la montagne
